name: Creative Technology
description:
Creative Technology is an internal group within the Disney Digital Network dedicated to creating captivating, high-end experiences, focusing on increased engagement, audience growth, and monetization opportunities.

All interactive experiences are built responsively with a mobile-first mentality, for cross-network distribution, using emerging technologies to create interactive experiences & push the boundaries of traditional web and application development.

Projects also include CT Game Engines
